## Color4.toArray() method

Stores from the starting index in the given array the Color4 successive values

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toArray(array: number[], index?: number): Color4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>number[]</code> | defines the array where to store the r,g,b components |
|  index | <code>number</code> | defines an optional index in the target array to define where to start storing values |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color4`

the current Color4 object
